Source Code Documentation¶

GROMACS Wrapper - pdb2gmx module¶

Python wrapper module for the GROMACS pdb2gmx module

class gromacs_wrapper.pdb2gmx.Pdb2gmx(input_structure_pdb_path, output_gro_path, output_top_tar_path, properties, **kwargs)[source]¶

Wrapper class for the 5.1.2 version of the GROMACS pdb2gmx module. :param input_structure_pdb_path: Path to the input PDB file. :type input_structure_pdb_path: str :param output_gro_path: Path to the output GRO file. :type output_gro_path: str :param output_top_tar_path: Path the output TOP topology in TAR format. :type output_top_tar_path: str :param properties: output_top_path (str): Path the output TOP file.

output_itp_path (str): Path the output itp file. water_type (str): Water molecule type.

Valid values: tip3p, spce, etc.
force_field (str): Force field to be used during the conversion.
Valid values: amber99sb-ildn, oplsaa, etc.
ignh (bool): Should pdb2gmx ignore the hidrogens in the original
structure.

gmx_path (str): Path to the GROMACS executable binary.

launch()[source]¶

Launches the execution of the GROMACS pdb2gmx module.

GROMACS Wrapper - editconf module¶

Python wrapper module for the GROMACS editconf module

class gromacs_wrapper.editconf.Editconf(input_gro_path, output_gro_path, properties, **kwargs)[source]¶

Wrapper for the 5.1.2 version of the editconf module :param input_gro_path: Path to the input GRO file. :type input_gro_path: str :param output_gro_path: Path to the output GRO file. :type output_gro_path: str :param properties:

distance_to_molecule (float): Distance of the box from the outermost
atom in nm. ie 1.0nm = 10 Angstroms.
box_type (str): Geometrical shape of the solvent box.
Available box types: octahedron, cubic, etc.

center_molecule (bool): Center molecule in the box.

launch()[source]¶

Launches the execution of the GROMACS editconf module.

GROMACS Wrapper - genion module¶

Python wrapper for the GROMACS genion module

class gromacs_wrapper.genion.Genion(input_tpr_path, output_gro_path, input_top_tar_path, output_top_tar_path, properties, **kwargs)[source]¶

Wrapper for the 5.1.2 version of the genion module :param input_tpr_path: Path to the input portable run input TPR file. :type input_tpr_path: str :param output_gro_path: Path to the input structure GRO file. :type output_gro_path: str :param input_top_tar_path: Path the input TOP topology in TAR format. :type input_top_tar_path: str :param output_top_tar_path: Path the output topology TOP and ITP files

tarball.
Parameters:properties (dic) –

output_top_path (str): Path the output topology TOP file. replaced_group (str): Group of molecules that will be replaced by the

solvent.

neutral (bool): Neutralize the charge of the system. concentration (float): Concentration of the ions in (mol/liter). seed (int): Seed for random number generator. gmx_path (str): Path to the GROMACS executable binary.
launch()[source]¶

Launches the execution of the GROMACS genion module.

GROMACS Wrapper - grompp module¶

Python wrapper for the GROMACS grompp module

class gromacs_wrapper.grompp.Grompp(input_gro_path, input_top_tar_path, input_mdp_path, output_tpr_path, properties, input_cpt_path=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Wrapper for the 5.1.2 version of the GROMACS grompp module. The GROMACS preprocessor module needs to be feeded with the input system and the molecular dynamics parameter file MDP, to create a portable binary run input file TPR. :param input_gro_path: Path to the input GROMACS structure GRO file. :type input_gro_path: str :param input_top_tar_path: Path the input GROMACS topology TOP file. :type input_top_tar_path: str :param output_tpr_path: Path to the output portable binary run file TPR. :type output_tpr_path: str :param input_cpt_path: Path to the input GROMACS checkpoint file CPT. :type input_cpt_path: str :param input_mdp_path: Path to the input GROMACS parameter input file MDP. :type input_mdp_path: str :param properties: gmx_path (str): Path to the GROMACS executable binary. :type properties: dic

launch()[source]¶

Launches the execution of the GROMACS grompp module.

GROMACS Wrapper - mdrun module¶

Python wrapper for the GROMACS mdrun module

class gromacs_wrapper.mdrun.Mdrun(input_tpr_path, output_trr_path, output_gro_path, properties, output_cpt_path=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Wrapper for the 5.1.2 version of the mdrun module :param input_tpr_path: Path to the portable binary run input file TPR. :type input_tpr_path: str :param output_trr_path: Path to the GROMACS uncompressed raw trajectory file TRR. :type output_trr_path: str :param output_gro_path: Path to the output GROMACS structure GRO file. :type output_gro_path: str :param properties: output_edr_path (str): Path to the output GROMACS portable energy file EDR.

output_xtc_path (str): Path to the GROMACS compressed trajectory file XTC. num_threads (str): The number of threads that is going to be used. gmx_path (str): Path to the GROMACS executable binary.
Parameters:output_cpt_path (str) – Path to the output GROMACS checkpoint file CPT.
launch()[source]¶

Launches the execution of the GROMACS mdrun module.

GROMACS Wrapper - solvate module¶

Python wrapper module for the GROMACS solvate module

class gromacs_wrapper.solvate.Solvate(input_solute_gro_path, output_gro_path, input_top_tar_path, output_top_tar_path, properties, **kwargs)[source]¶

Wrapper for the 5.1.2 version of the GROMACS solvate module :param input_solute_gro_path: Path to the input GRO file. :type input_solute_gro_path: str :param output_gro_path: Path to the output GRO file. :type output_gro_path: str :param input_top_tar_path: Path the input TOP topology in TAR format. :type input_top_tar_path: str :param output_top_tar_path: Path the output topology in TAR format. :type output_top_tar_path: str :param properties: output_top_path (str): Path the output TOP file.

intput_solvent_gro_path (str): Path to the GRO file contanining the
structure of the solvent.

gmx_path (str): Path to the GROMACS executable binary.

MMB API - pdb module¶

class mmb_api.pdb.MmbPdb(pdb_code, output_pdb_path, **kwargs)[source]¶

Wrapper class for the MMB group PDB REST API. This class is a wrapper for the PDB (http://www.rcsb.org/pdb/home/home.do) mirror of the MMB group REST API (http://mmb.irbbarcelona.org/api/) :param pdb_code: Protein Data Bank (PDB) four letter code.

ie: ‘2ki5’
Parameters:output_pdb_path (str) – File path where the PDB file will be stored. ie: ‘/home/user1/2ki5.pdb’
get_pdb()[source]¶

Writes the PDB file content of self._pdb_code to self._output_pdb_path

MMB API - uniprot module¶

Mutation fetcher module

class mmb_api.uniprot.MmbVariants(pdb_code)[source]¶

Wrapper class for the MMB group UNIPROT REST API. This class is a wrapper for the UNIPROT (http://www.uniprot.org/) mirror of the MMB group REST API (http://mmb.irbbarcelona.org/api/) :param pdb_code: Protein Data Bank (PDB) four letter code.

ie: ‘2ki5’
get_pdb_variants()[source]¶
Returns the variants of the self._uniprot mapped to the
self_pdb.
Returns:List of mapped variants
Return type:list of str
get_uniprot()[source]¶

Returns the UNIPROT code corresponding to the self._pdb_code.

Returns:UNIPROT code.
Return type:str
get_variants()[source]¶

Returns the variants of the self._uniprot code.

Returns:List of variants
Return type:list of str

Python wrapper module for SCWRL

class scwrl_wrapper.scwrl.Scwrl4(input_pdb_path, output_pdb_path, properties, **kwargs)[source]¶

Wrapper class for the 4.0 version of SCWRL. :param input_pdb_path: Path to the input PDB file. :type input_pdb_path: str :param output_pdb_path: Path to the output mutated PDB file. :type output_pdb_path: srt :param properties: All properties and system path :type properties: dic

launch()[source]¶

Launches the execution of the SCWRL binary.
